docs.snippet: Administration officials said the trip was intended in part to highlight the extraordinary economic benefits of national parks in their centennial year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Administration officials said the trip was intended in part to highlight the extraordinary economic benefits of national parks in their centennial year.
docs.abstract: Pres Obama vacations with his family in Yosemite National Park, where they visit Carlsbad Caverns; series of Obama family vacations to national parks are intended to highlight benefits of protecting wilderness land, part of Obama administration's legacy on conservation.

headline.main: President Obama and Family Tour ‘Cool’ Carlsbad Caverns
headline.print_headline: President and Family Tour ‘Cool’ Carlsbad Caverns

docs.snippet: Congress may be moving to repeal "Obamacare," but millions of people are still signing up. The administration said Tuesday that 11.5 million enrolled nationwide through Dec. 24, ahead of last year's pace....

docs.lead_paragraph: Label-checking the first daughters Sasha and Malia Obama, now 14 and 11, can be risky for designers if they seem to be capitalizing on the girls as celebrities.
docs.abstract: Eric Wilson notes that much attention has been paid to emerging styles of Pres Obama's daughters Sasha and Malia since his re-election; observes that designers who label-check first daughters run risk of appearing as if they are capitalizing on the girls as celebrities.

headline.seo: Sasha and Malia Thrust Into Fashion Roles

docs.snippet: Mr. Kerry will use his remarks to confront Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel after bitterness over a United Nations resolution, a State Department official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Kerry will use his remarks to confront Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel after bitterness over a United Nations resolution, a State Department official said.
docs.abstract: Sec of State John Kerry prepares final bid for Israeli-Palestinian peace accord in speech that will build on 2014 failed attempt and include subtle rebuke of Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu; remarks follow Israeli outrage over United States abstention from United Nations resolution denouncing Israel's ongoing building of West Bank settlements.

headline.main: John Kerry, in a Final, Pointed Plea, Will Outline a Vision of Mideast Peace
